s.text: I've been remarried for six years to my present husband, and he insists that my daughter should refer to him as either "Dad" or "Mr.
How long does it take for the hurt to lessen?
How long does it take for the hurt to lessen?
You cannot live like this and needn't tolerate his in-your-face behavior.
Her misunderstanding reminds Prudie of the policeman who asked a driver what gear she was in at the moment her car hit another.
And for whatever it's worth, Prudie has never heard of anyone saying, "Stepdad, please pass the salt," so forget that one.
